Title: Ninotchka
Writer: Charles Brackett (screen play), Billy Wilder (screen play), Walter Reisch (screen play), Melchior Lengyel (based on the original story by)
Actors: Greta Garbo, Melvyn Douglas, Ina Claire, Bela Lugosi
Plot: A stern Russian woman sent to Paris on official business finds herself attracted to a man who represents everything she is supposed to detest.
Awards: Nominated for 4 Oscars. Another 3 wins & 2 nominations.
